urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text: Need to change a flight, add a bag, pick a seat or modify your reservation? Visit MY BOOKING at https://t.co/Ehj3JcVjh5 or download our app to do it quick and easy (our 2 favourite words after "low fares").

Ce mois, nous avons accueilli Thunder Bay et Ottawa au sein de notre réseau ainsi que le premier de plusieurs nouveaux aéronefs qui nous permettront d’apporter encore plus de bas tarifs pour les Canadiens. 
https://t.co/OdQ8Yphmm3
This month we started service in Thunder Bay & Ottawa and also welcomed the first of many new aircraft that will allow us to bring more low fares to more Canadians. https://t.co/OdQ8Yphmm3

data.text: Nous sommes fiers de voler! Flair reconnaît le #MoisdesFiertés et est fière d'être une organisation inclusive qui célèbre et soutient la diversité. Nous sommes heureux de célébrer avec nos employés et amis LGBTQ2+ ce mois-ci et bien plus encore!🌈💚 https://t.co/PG6w3412rY

We fly with pride! Flair recognizes #PrideMonth and is proud to be an inclusive organization which celebrates and supports diversity. We are excited to celebrate with our LGBTQ2+ employees and friends this month and beyond! 🌈💚 https://t.co/9pk84TaddB
